##################
    Signals
##################

The **Signals** menu allows to load, filter, transform, export and modify a signal. 

.. figure:: /_images/signals_menu.png
   :align: center

   filtering
   export_data
   bad_channels
   eeg_channels
   modify_a_signal   
   channel_correspondency
   operators
   resynch_signals
